about.summary: pytest plugin to re-run tests to eliminate flaky failures

name: pytest-rerunfailures
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pytest-rerunfailures" %}
{% set version = "7.0" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f3c9cf31339bf87b048c09dadb633a81156fa4899527fffc55cde105d04ed5fd

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - pytest >=3.10
    - python
  run:
    - pytest >=3.10
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - pytest_rerunfailures

about:
  home: https://github.com/pytest-dev/pytest-rerunfailures
  license: MPL-2.0
  license_family: OTHER
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: pytest plugin to re-run tests to eliminate flaky failures

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - pg-hbk
    - sy-hbk
